```{r join data frames (96), include=FALSE}

all96 <- p96 %>% 
  full_join(pequiv96, by = c("persnr", "hhnr", "hhnrakt", "cid", "pid", "syear", "mhhnr", "hid"))
all96 <- all96 %>%
  full_join(pkind96, by = c("persnr", "hhnr", "hhnrakt", "cid", "pid", "syear", "mhhnr", "hid", "welle"))
all96 <- all96 %>%
  full_join(pgen96, by = c("persnr", "hhnr", "hhnrakt", "cid", "pid", "syear", "mhhnr", "hid"))

all96


#"d1110896", "e1110196", "l1110296", "i1111096", "d1110196", "w1110896"
```


```{r join data frames (96), echo=FALSE}

select96 <- all96 %>%
  select(persnr, pid, hhnr, cid, welle, mp66f, mp15, d11102ll, d1110896, e1110196, l1110296, mkzahl, mkgjahr, mp10501, mp10502, isced97_96, partz96, lfs96, merwzeit, e1110196, i1111096, d1110196, w1110896) %>%
  rename(parleave = mp66f, employ = mp15, sex = d11102ll, education = d1110896, occup = e1110196,  region = l1110296, kinderzahl = mkzahl, kindbd = mkgjahr, sex2 = mp10501, birthyear = mp10502, edisced = isced97_96, partner= partz96, employ2 = lfs96, workhpw = merwzeit, workhpy = e1110196, income = i1111096, age = d1110196, longweight = w1110896)

select96
```
